rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasAcronym (SKG-IF labels: acronym)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The acronym of the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasCurrency (SKG-IF labels: funded_amount)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Amount funded for a Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:float

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: SKG-O: grant
rdf:Description.dc:title: The SKG-IF Ontology: grant
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Scientific Knowledge Graphs â€“ Interoperability Framework (SKG-IF) WG
rdf:Description.dc:rights: This work is distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution License (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: SKG-O, the SKG-IF Ontology, is not yet another bibliographic ontology. Rather it is just a place where existing and complementary ontological entities from several other ontologies, all employed in the Scientific Knowledge Graph Interoperability Framework (SKG-IF), are grouped together for the purpose of providing descriptive metadata compliant with the SKG-IF Data Model.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datacite:Identifier
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:usesIdentifierScheme -[1]-> datacite:IdentifierScheme * literal:hasLiteralValue -[1]-> rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasFundingAgency (SKG-IF labels: funding_agency)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The local identifier of an Organisation funding the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * frapo:FundingAgency

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: literal:hasLiteralValue (SKG-IF labels: value)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The external identifier.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * datacite:Identifier
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datacite:hasIdentifier (SKG-IF labels: identifiers)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Objects representing external identifiers for the entity.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * datacite:Identifier

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ti:hasIntervalEndDate (SKG-IF labels: end)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The end datetime (if any) of the Grant. The string should be compliant with the ISO 8601 datetime string.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * ti:TimeInterval
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasCallIdentifier (SKG-IF labels: funding_stream)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The funding stream of the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:withRole (SKG-IF labels: role)
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * scoro:ProjectRole

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:supports (SKG-IF labels: beneficiaries)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Organisations identifiers funded by the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Organization

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:isRelatedToRoleInTime (SKG-IF labels: contributions)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Objects, each describing an Agent, its contribution, and declared affiliations to one or more Organisations in the context of the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * pro:RoleInTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ti:hasIntervalStartDate (SKG-IF labels: start)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The start datetime of the Grant. The string should be compliant with the ISO 8601 datetime string.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * ti:TimeInterval
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasCurrencyCode (SKG-IF labels: currency)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Currency of the funded amount, following ISO 4217.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Keywords of a Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:title (SKG-IF labels: title)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Title of the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:abstract (SKG-IF labels: abstract)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The abstract or a description of the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * rdfs:Literal

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:RoleInTime
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* pro:isHeldBy -[1]-> foaf:Agent * pro:withRole -[0..N]-> scoro:ProjectRole

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: datacite:usesIdentifierScheme (SKG-IF labels: scheme)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The scheme for the external identifier.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * datacite:Identifier
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * datacite:IdentifierScheme

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dcterms:temporal (SKG-IF labels: duration)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The duration of the Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * ti:TimeInterval

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:Grant (SKG-IF labels: Grant)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The entity Grant describes funding awarded to a Agent by a funding body. These bodies, both public and private, can be funders, foundations, governments, agencies or institutions.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* datacite:hasIdentifier -[0..N]-> datacite:Identifier * dcterms:abstract -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * dcterms:temporal -[0..1]-> ti:TimeInterval * dcterms:title -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * foaf:homepage -[0..1]-> foaf:Document * frapo:hasAcronym -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * frapo:hasCallIdentifier -[0..1]-> rdfs:Literal * frapo:hasCurrency -[0..1]-> xsd:float * frapo:hasCurrencyCode -[0..N]-> xsd:string * frapo:hasFundingAgency -[0..1]-> frapo:FundingAgency * frapo:hasGrantNumber -[0..1]-> xsd:string * frapo:supports -[0..N]-> foaf:Organization * prism:keyword -[0..N]-> rdfs:Literal * pro:isRelatedToRoleInTime -[0..N]-> pro:RoleInTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: foaf:homepage (SKG-IF labels: website)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An URL poiting to the website of the funded project.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Document

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ti:TimeInterval
rdf:Description.dc:description:
The properties that can be used with this class are:
* ti:hasIntervalEndDate -[0..1]-> xsd:dateTime * ti:hasIntervalStartDate -[1]-> xsd:dateTime

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: pro:isHeldBy (SKG-IF labels: by)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The identifier of an Agent contributing to a Grant.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * pro:RoleInTime
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following classes (range): * foaf:Agent

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: frapo:hasGrantNumber (SKG-IF labels: grant_number)
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Unique code identifiying the Grant at the funder.
rdf:Description.dc:description:
In SKG-IF, it is used in the following classes (domain): * frapo:Grant
In SKG-IF, it is used to link to entities belonging to the following data types (range): * xsd:string
